choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
### Assistant:

Here's your healthy meal plan for the next seven days, based on your dietary restrictions. Each day has three meals, with a variety of options to choose from so that you can mix and match as desired. Please note that I have assumed that you are an average adult male who is active throughout the day. If you have any specific allergies or sensitivities that may impact this plan, please let me know before we proceed:
Day 1: 
Breakfast - Oatmeal with almond milk (no nut extract), sliced banana and chopped walnuts 
Lunch - Grilled chicken breast, roasted sweet potato, steamed broccoli, mixed green salad with olive oil dressing 
Dinner - Baked salmon fillet, quinoa, sautéed zucchini and onion, side of brown rice 
Day 2: 
Breakfast - Scrambled eggs (no dairy), whole wheat toast with mashed avocado and sliced tomato 
Lunch - Turkey breast, mixed green salad with balsamic vinaigrette dressing, roasted sweet potato wedges 
Dinner - Baked cod fillet, sautéed kale and spinach, quinoa and black bean pilaf 
Day 3: 
Breakfast - Smoothie made from almond milk (no nut extract), banana, peanut butter, and spinach powder; whole wheat toast with mashed avocado and sliced tomato 
Lunch - Grilled chicken breast, mixed green salad with olive oil dressing, roasted sweet potato wedges 
Dinner - Baked tilapia fillet, sautéed zucchini and onion, quinoa and black bean pilaf 
Day 4: 
Breakfast - Scrambled eggs (no dairy), whole wheat toast with mashed avocado and sliced tomato 
Lunch - Grilled chicken breast, mixed green salad with balsamic vinaigrette dressing, roasted sweet potato wedges 
Dinner - Baked cod fillet, sautéed kale<|im_end|>
